movie.title: The Death of Stalin
movie.plot: Moscow, 1953. After being in power for nearly thirty years, Soviet dictator Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin (Adrian McLoughlin) takes ill and quickly dies. Now the members of the Council of Ministers scramble for power.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 18 wins & 35 nominations.
